name: Ladies of Sorrow: Night One
description:
- SYNOPSIS -

"Angela and her parents have just moved into their new home: an isolated gigantic mansion, which Angela's mother inherited from a recently deceased grandmother. However, during her very first night in the mansion, Angela realizes there is someone -- or something -- very dangerous within that place... but could it be real? Ou could it be only in Angela's head?"

- DESCRIPTION -

Ladies of Sorrow: Night One is a 2D survival horror & point-and-click adventure game prototype, deeply inspired by classic horror games, movies and novels. It features voiced dialogues in English and is available in 11 languages: English, Portuguese, Spanish, Italian, French, German, Polish, Russian, Korean, Chinese and Japanese.

- GAME MODES -

There are 3 game modes: 1) exploration mode, when players can safely explore the mansion and freely interact with objects and NPCs; 2) escape mode, when players can only run and hide from the "stalker"; and 3) panic mode, when players must take a quick action to avoid a "game over." Controls are as follow:

LEFT-CLICK: Walk or interact
DOUBLE LEFT-CLICK: Start running
RIGHT-CLICK: Stop moving
MOUSE WHEEL: Select item
ESC: Open inventory menu

- SOCIAL -

If you liked it, please consider following our game's social pages! You can find links to the game's Twitter, Instagram, Facebook and YouTube pages on the game's LINKTREE. Thank you!
